mainInformation.title: Learn English together with us
mainInformation.subtitle: Why should you study English?
mainInformation.text: It's a great skill that connects you with people worldwide and opens up exciting job opportunities. The best part is, it's not as hard as you might think – in fact, it can be a lot of fun! Discover the importance of English. It's the key to global communication and amazing career prospects. The best news is, learning it is an enjoyable journey.

bannerInformation.text1: English is one of the most widely spoken languages globally, making it a crucial tool for international communication. Learning English allows you to converse with people from diverse backgrounds and cultures, breaking down language barriers and fostering global connections.
bannerInformation.text2: English proficiency is often a requirement for many job opportunities, especially in multinational companies and industries like technology, business, and tourism. Mastering English can open up a world of career possibilities, increase your employability, and potentially lead to higher-paying jobs.
bannerInformation.text3: Many of the world's top universities and educational institutions use English as the medium of instruction. Learning English can open doors to higher education and research opportunities, enabling you to pursue advanced degrees and gain valuable academic experiences.

mainBlock.quote: The limits of my language means the limits of my world.
mainBlock.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein, Austrian-British philosopher
